Question: U-tec Group Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
U-tec Group Inc.

Product: ULTRALOQ Bolt Fingerprint Matter Smart Lock

- Cutting-Edge Support for Matter over Thread technology for seamless integration with various smart home devices.
- Six-in-One Unlocking Methods for Keyless Experience, including fingerprint recognition, passcodes, mobile app access, and backup keys.
- Extended Battery Life of up to one year, supporting 8 alkaline cells for minimal battery replacements.

Source: https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/u-tec-introduces-ultimate-smart-home-compatibility-with-the-new-ultraloq-bolt-fingerprint-matter-smart-locks-at-ces-301025185.html
Summary_cn:
宇特克集团有限公司。

产品： ULTRALOQ Bolt指纹掌交Matter智能锁

- 先进的Matter over Thread技术支持，与各种智能家居设备无缝集成。
- 六合一开锁方式，无钥匙体验，包括指纹识别、密码、手机应用访问和备用钥匙。
- 长达一年的延长电池寿命，支持8个碱性电池，减少电池更换次数。

来源：https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/u-tec-introduces-ultimate-smart-home-compatibility-with-the-new-ultraloq-bolt-fingerprint-matter-smart-locks-at-ces-301025185.html
